subSubSection.paragraph:
Holotype : Male, INPA-SP 31 , Brazil , Amazonas, Manaus, Reserva Ducke , C. Martius leg.,
01.III. 1994
. Paratypes :
1 female
INPA-SP 32 , with same locality as for holotype , H. Höfer and T. Gasnier leg.,
13 .I. 1991
;
1 female
and
7 juveniles
, INPA-SP 33 , with same locality as for holotype , F.B. Apolinário leg.,
20 .II. 1990
;
1 female
, INPA-SP 34 , with same locality as for holotype ,
10 .XII. 1990
, F.B. Apolinário leg.

Remark : According to Pinto-da-Rocha & Brescovit in Pinto-da-Rocha et al. ( 2002 ), the following paratype has been deposited at INPA , but the lot was not found in the present reorganization process: female,
07.VIII. 1990
, F.B. Apolinário leg.; female,
21 .XII. 1990
, F.B. Apolinário leg.; Brazil , Amazonas, Manaus, Reserva Ducke .

Remark : The lot INPA-SP 37 was originally constituted by two females, but it was separated and
1 female
was donated to the CZPB .
